553530.name: Teratini VR
553530.description:
If you purchased this game prior to Sept 2017, please contact us for a complimentary key to The Afterwoods. Aftter we're able to validate proof of purchase, we'll send you a key. Thanks!

-------
In this VR adventure you are the long foretold mage who will restore life to Teratini, a land decimated by invaders. To succeed in your quest, you'll need to train dragons, wield a magic staff, and learn to fly to defeat enemies and reclaim land that was lost long ago.

Set in a fantasy world, Teratini VR game play is a cross between tennis, dodge ball, and sword fighting.

Neat Stuff
  • Many enemy variations, abilities, and attack formations.
  • Train, fight, and level up with your dragon.

Things to know before you buy or try
  • Not the best game if you are sensitive to heights.
553530.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
